mapper.select: select no as no, title as title, content as content, regdate as regdate from userboard

select no as no, title as title, content as content, regdate as regdate from userboard
where no = #{value}

select no as no, name as name, maker as maker, price as price, memo as memo, limiteage as limiteAge, eventcode as event, smallcategory_no as smallCat, image as image from product where eventcode = #{value}

select b.NO as no, b.NAME as name, b.PHONE as phone, b.ADDRESS as address, b.ATM as atm, b.FRESHFOOD as freshFood, b.IMAGE as img, b.LOTTO as lotto, b.PARCELSERVICE as parcelService, b.LIFESERVICE as lifeService, B.EMPLOYEE_NO as "emp.no" from BRANCH B,EMPLOYEE E where B.employee_no=e.no

select b.NO as no, b.NAME as name, b.PHONE as phone, b.ADDRESS as address, b.ATM as atm, b.FRESHFOOD as freshFood, b.IMAGE as img, b.LOTTO as lotto, b.PARCELSERVICE as parcelService, b.LIFESERVICE as lifeService, B.EMPLOYEE_NO as "emp.no" from BRANCH B,EMPLOYEE E where B.employee_no=e.no and ${value} = 'Y' order by b.ADDRESS desc

select b.NO as no, b.NAME as name, b.PHONE as phone, b.ADDRESS as address, b.ATM as atm, b.FRESHFOOD as freshFood, b.IMAGE as img, b.LOTTO as lotto, b.PARCELSERVICE as parcelService, b.LIFESERVICE as lifeService, B.EMPLOYEE_NO as "emp.no" from BRANCH B,EMPLOYEE E where B.employee_no=e.no and b.NO = #{value}

select count(*) from BRANCH
name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and address like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
